name: Spork
description:
Spork is a 2D adventure with minimal challenge and a sense of surprise. It begins as a loose parody of Zork, but quickly takes off into its own tale. After waking up in a field with no idea who you are, your exploratory tendencies get you into deep trouble. Have fun!

Source files are provided for educational purposes. If you want to use them to release something, you have to clear it with me first.
